title: Strictly Come Dancing: Backstage with the stars ahead of first live show
description: Fifteen couples are hoping to waltz their way to the glitterball trophy.
content:
It's that time of year again.
A few weeks ago it was picnics and hanging the washing outside. Now kids are back at school, the nights are drawing in - and Strictly Come Dancing is back.

title: Huntington's disease breakthrough 'is like winning the lottery 10 times over'
description: Families are elated by news of the first treatment for the devastating disease - but when and how will the NHS fund it?
content:
Gemma Botting burst into tears when she saw the news headlines this week about a treatment for Huntington's.
"I must have cried for three hours. Then the kids got home from school and I showed my daughter the BBC story and she burst into tears."

title: Harrods customers' details stolen in IT systems breach
description: Information like customers' names and contact details was taken after one of Harrods' third-party provider systems was compromised, the luxury department store said in a statement.
content:
Harrods has warned its e-commerce customers that their personal data may have been taken in an IT systems breach.
